post:
Web Alternative was founded in Québec (Canada) in 2005 and is now part of Groupe Iluska Ltée since 2017.

Web Alternative was created with a very specific mission: to provide an alternative to commercial web hosts and offer services such as web hosting and internet related services.

Web Alternative is your human partner for professional services. Our goal is not to make mass web hosting as most other hosts, but to have a reasonable number of users to be close to them and be able to help and support them.


SPECIAL OFFERS / COUPONS
